lines.text: Hm... there's nothing in the ash pile that's recognizable as something that could start the fire.
But... if it were just a paper match or something, it could've gone up in smoke with the rest of whatever it was.
Hrm. We didn't find a matchbook or anything, but...
That coulda been tossed on the fire too- or flushed down the toilet, or buried in the trash.
...Thing is, would Slick have let the wizard just light a match and do whatever with it?
He had him at gunpoint- lighting a match would've been pretty suspicious.
If <c=#FF00FF>something else</c> were already on fire when Slick showed up, though...
